titleStmt.title: In obitu summæ spei principis Henrici Iacobi vi Serenissimi Britanniæ magnæ, Hiberniæ & Galliæ Regis Filii Primogeniti Lessus. Authore Dauide Wedderburno scholæ Abredonensis moderatore.
titleStmt.author: Wedderburn, David, 1580-1646.

notesStmt.note: Print faded and show-through; pages marked and stained; title page cropped, with loss of imprint date (supplied from J.F.K. Johnson, Bibliographia Aberdonensis).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
